caption.title: Outbreaks of Ae. albopictus-borne chikungunya in Italy and on Reunion Island.
caption.p: (a) Number of reported, and laboratory confirmed, infections in Ravenna, Italy, during the chikungunya outbreak in 2007 [ 9]. (b) Total number of infections reported by the island-wide surveillance system on Reunion Island during 2005-2006 [ 36]. The horizontal lines in (a, b) indicate the time frames and infections that each dataset covers. (c) The centroids of the patches of the metapopulation model for Reunion Island.
